website_summaries.verdict: This bench vise is an affordable alternative to professional-grade vises designed for heavy duty use. Woodworkers and gunsmiths will especially appreciate the size and depth of the jaw assembly.
pros: Large 6-inch jaws and a nearly 6-inch maximum depth will handle most amateur projects with ease
Large anvil area for bending and hammering metal
cons: Not designed for heavy-duty professional use
Vise can lock up permanently if extended to maximum advertised depth

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing. Once you lock it
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is amazing. Once you lock it, it does not swivel. You also do not want to turn the handle all the way out. The threaded rod that moves the jaws open and closed, is a bit of a pain to put back together. Other than that, this is a very good vise. Smooth working and things clamped down in the jaws do not move. The only thing they could improve on this is. Put a stop on the thread rod. You unscrew the jaws to wide, it's a challange to get the threads started to screw back in. I had to partially dissemble it to and get working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: WheelHorse74

customer_reviews.title: Quality was higher than anticipated, great value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a vice for working on guns, but didn't want to spend a lot. Enter the D3248. I expected mediocre quality at this price point, but was blown away. This thing is solid as can be, heavy and can take some abuse. It moves very well with no grinding or hiccups from poor machining. The only negative, if you can call it that, is that it appears that the manufacturer applies grease to the system through the submersion method. I had to use about 10 paper towels to wipe it down and clean it up, but that's preferable to not being greased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes this vise is perfect. I'm using it to hold metal stakes to hammer/forge silver against in jewelry-making. It's been very sturdy so far and all of the elements operate smoothly. Yes, it was covered with a ton of grease when I received it - but this is to protect it from rust between manufacturing and purchase......the same reason I lightly oil steel tools I don't use on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thinks

customer_reviews.title: Solid vise, solid value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all-purpose vise, and a very good value at the price. Clamping is secure and true, and the swivel and and screw are reasonably smooth. Now, if you're running a professional machine shop, this may not be precise and well-made as a Wilton, but at about 1/4 or 1/5 the price of a Wilton, it's plenty good for the vast majority of homeowners.
customer_reviews.author: Costero

customer_reviews.title: Great vise.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly for working on AR 15s and other guns. I was hesitant about the quality since I couldn't see it before I bought it. I've torqued things down, banged, tightened and untightened things and this has held up like a champ! I'm very happy with this vise and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: 6 inch Jaws
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and everything said 6 inch. But it didn't specifically say base or jaws. It is Scarry ordering on line and needed a very nice vice for my husband. This was exactly what I needed . Someone else commentet nice vice for small garage work. I believe this is way more than that. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: amazon lori k mi

customer_reviews.title: Incredible vise.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box and saw how husky and big it was for the $. I have used it now for several months and it is better than others I have had in the last 30 years. Very precise and smooth. I have beared down pretty hard on it several times and it has taken it in stride. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: wallace m duffy

customer_reviews.title: broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: The first time I opened this vise all the way (but not to the point of it separating), it would not close again no matter how much pressure I applied to the handle. And the handle was bent upon receipt btw. It seems the screw mechanism is poorly made and jams easily. Sent it back! Don't buy this, invest in a quality vise instead.
customer_reviews.author: JeffNYC74

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has held up well through several projects. Do be careful not to vise anything that you don't want teeth marks in. Overall, the built quality is great and it doesn't loosen while vised like other cheap ones do. Nice color, nice price, great product by Shop Fox!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Really like this vise
customer_reviews.text: Really like this vise. Just the right size for home use as long as you don't need to clamp anything over 4". Like the durability of it. Used 3/8" bolts with flat washer and a lock washer. I like the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Nice vise and claps evenly and firmly
customer_reviews.text: Nice vise and claps evenly and firmly. Although it came VERY greasy with black lubricant. Had to thoroughly clean it before mounting it to the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Built
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, well made unit that is a stable platform for the usual work I do around the house. I have not struck the anvil with a hammer or used a pipe extension on it to tighten up beyond my hand strength. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren N.

customer_reviews.title: Super Vise!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. Coated with a lot of grease but it wiped off easily with paper towels. Very heavy duty and smooth...what else do you need in a vise? Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JAMBO

customer_reviews.title: This was a darn good purchase. I got it through Amazon's warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: This was a darn good purchase. I got it through Amazon's warehouse deals. Try obtaining a vise like this quality for the price you can obtain via Amazon. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wagon

customer_reviews.title: Shop vise
customer_reviews.text: This vise is well made,strong enough to break stubborn bolts. An excellent addition to your shop will hold any item while pounding with a hammer, takes a beating.Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: nice little vice
customer_reviews.text: good little vice I have used this a good many times and has worked great with no problems. It is not a big vice but for the average tinker in the shop guy this will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Work!
customer_reviews.text: This vise is a strong, sturdy asset to my shop. I recommend this vise for small to medium jewelry makers.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench Vise
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this long but initial impression is that it good quality. It got a good amount of weight to it and everything moves smoothly. Easily bolted to work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Maddog

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: it is a cast vice but building horse shoe's doesnt requier a whole bunch of hardnes and the anvile is wide and plained nice and flat and the jaw's are alined and nice and tite [ no woble] good medeim duty pice .
customer_reviews.author: Michael j Riemer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes likes likes it. Thank you for sending it faster than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Corkey Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: Great vise for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far it's turned out to be a very nice vise for the money. Very handy to have when a third hand is needed.
customer_reviews.author: JoeBotts

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: this a very good, tough vice and it works great. Recommend finding the right size bolt to anchor it down so there is no movement.
customer_reviews.author: tunamba

customer_reviews.title: Good Vice
customer_reviews.text: Medium duty vice for home workbench. Works well & seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JD-MAC

customer_reviews.title: Vice
customer_reviews.text: This vice is very well made. Precisely machined. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: glad to have it
customer_reviews.text: great bang for the buck. glad i found this product
customer_reviews.author: Dzu Duong

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Vise is very good for the price. If you need one small step better the price will be almost doubled.
customer_reviews.author: valdim

customer_reviews.title: This product is "GREAT"
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this item off amazon and it came in excellent condition and works perfect, and looks great. I would recommend it to anyone looking to purchase a good bench vise.
customer_reviews.author: AUDRIUS TARVYDAS

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This vise does what I ask of it; good clamping and easy operation. Took off one star because the handle could be stronger, thought that might be a user problem--I'm using it to reform 6061 angle, and tried using a "cheater" bar. Wound up bending the handle instead.
customer_reviews.author: RGM

customer_reviews.title: Vise
customer_reviews.text: Small, heavy, strong and does everything I need to be done. I also purchased their drill press/sander and I was pleased with both items.
customer_reviews.author: T. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Great Vise for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The vise jaws line up great, and has no play when locked in place. I had no problems with product when it was shipped, just took it out of the box and set it up. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: it is too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger when I saw it on the page,( they should show it better), it is however a good vise.
customer_reviews.author: moto-x

customer_reviews.title: Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This vise is exactly what you pay for and more. It is a great buy when you consider what you paid. Used within its limits for mild to intermediate shop work it more than does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Would be okay I guess, bought it for my dad. But he was looking for something bigger. looks like it would be okay for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husband. He absolutely loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He absolutely loves it! He says it is strong and he really likes how he can swivel it.
customer_reviews.author: crow

customer_reviews.title: Great vice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice vice. You will not regret your purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hollingshed

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy product
customer_reviews.text: It should be a relativly simple product. It needs to be solidly built, and do what it's suppose to do and be a good value. On these points it does well, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Fife

customer_reviews.title: Missing in action
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vise several months ago and still don't know when it will arrive. I can't rate it till I see it.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: First one recieved broken, second one damanged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: First one I unscrewed all the way to clean the cosmoline packing oil off of it. Well, after that I could never get it to screw back together. There were a lot of metal shavings from production so I cleaned them out of the threads. Still nothing. I had to send back to amazon. The new one which was poorly packed...shame on amazon..... had the adjuster bar bent into an L. I kept it. I can still use it fine this way or bend it back.
customer_reviews.author: bms231

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice!
customer_reviews.text: After opening the jaws they will not close. I've tried slowly threading the screw back in but to no avail. Very poor quality. Do NOT Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Lilly

customer_reviews.title: great vise
customer_reviews.text: the only reason this vise did not recieve 5 stars is because it didnt come with any mounting hardware. Now i am not sure whether this was a mistake with just my order, or if i am the only one that doesnt know you have to get your own bolts for mounting... probably the latter... but all the same my vise didnt come with it and now i gotta run to lowes lol... great quality vise and would still buy despite missing hardware!
customer_reviews.author: Ignomoly

product_meta.title: Shop Fox D3250 Bench Vise with Swivel Base, 6-Inch
product_meta.description:
Size:6-InchFROM THE MANUFACTURER
This precision made Bench Vise feature heavy castings, 360 Degree swivel range with two locking levers, pipe jaws and a perfectly flat anvil face. Milled square center slide ensures jaws stay aligned as the vise is tightened.
